name: The Night World LITE (FNaF Fan Game)
name_original: The Night World LITE (FNaF Fan Game)
description:
You are a security guard hired to protect the Fazbear Theater during the nightshift. What could go wrong?

Tap buttons to move, CAMERA to interact, ALARM to sound alarm, use fan to lower temperature. Game auto-saves every few minutes. Use your save code to set the time of the night for the next time you play.

This might be the hardest FNaF Fan Game ever.

Music by FesliyanStudios, graphics by me, sound effects by me, FNaF by Scott Cawthon.

Made on Scratch
